00041  PROGRAM main
00042 
00043 ! Common Variables
00044  USE Domain,      ONLY : iStep, MaxStep, RelaxStep, tDump, tStat
00045  USE FluidParams, ONLY : eps, pConv
00046  IMPLICIT NONE
00047 
00048 
00049 ! Read input parameters, allocate memory for common arrays and initialize
00050  CALL Parameters
00051  CALL MemAlloc(1)
00052  CALL Init
00053 
00054 ! Main Loop
00055  DO iStep = 1, MaxStep
00056 
00057 ! Half momentum step
00058    CALL PreStreamG
00059 
00060 ! Order parameter step 1
00061    CALL PreStreamF
00062    CALL HydrodynamicsF
00063    CALL PostStreamF
00064 
00065 ! Half order parameter step 2
00066    CALL PreStreamF
00067    CALL HydrodynamicsF
00068 
00069 ! Perform interpolation and calculate velocity and pressure
00070    CALL UpdateG
00071    CALL HydrodynamicsG
00072    CALL UpdateF
00073 
00074 ! Complete order parameter step 2 and momentum step
00075    CALL PostStreamF
00076    CALL PostStreamG
00077 
00078 ! Save data if required
00079    IF (MOD(iStep,tStat) == 0) CALL Stats
00080    IF (MOD(iStep,tDump) == 0) CALL VtkPlane
00081 
00082 ! Test pressure convergence
00083    IF ( eps <= pConv ) EXIT
00084 
00085  END DO
00086  RelaxStep = iStep - 1
00087 
00088 ! Save final data
00089  CALL FinalDump
00090  CALL VtkPlane
00091 
00092 ! Deallocate common arrays
00093  CALL MemAlloc(2)
00094 
00095  END PROGRAM
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:00 2008 for LL-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
